tagline: The Don't Panic app - our team's entry into the TW app contest
body:
## Don't Panic

Don't Panic is a great travel companion to TWers on the move. It tells you where all the offices are, how to get there, where you'll be staying, where to eat and hangout. If you ever run into trouble, it can quickly get you in touch with the local admins and legal team too. 

### Features:

* Office listings
* Admin info
* Accommodation details 
* Public places
* Web & mobile (native and browser)
* Wiki style read + write to AllTW.

### Stack:
* RoR Web service
* Angular JS + Twitter Bootstrap web app - both desktop and mobile
* iOS app
* Android app

### TODO:
* Web offline access (native apps are already fully offline)
* Panic buttons - automatically call the nearest admin and inform ERT teams of a situation with your last known location.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
name: Dont-panic
